description: (This course has a quota - MECH4500 - 130 students/MECH4501 - 35 students) Thesis project on an approved topic that integrates engineering skills acquired through the engineering program Detailed description available from the Mechanical Engineering office. Students commencing course in sem 1 enrol in MECH4500 for sem 1 and sem 2; students commencing in sem 2 enrol in MECH4501 for sem 2 and the following sem 1.
prerequisites: Permission of Head of School required.
